attributes.action: Make non alcoholic drinks cheaper than Alcoholic drinks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age when they are continuously bomb barding us with don't drink and drive.  There is no motivation 'Not to drink non alcoholic drinks' when, invariable they are dearer, (or the same price) as alcoholic drinks.  We would like to see something in place, where it is illegal to sell non-alcoholic for more.  (By 10-20% of the price of alcoholic) If this were the case, the public would not have an excuse to drink alcoholic, when they are driving!
